xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: nextcloud.welcome=Welcome to the XWiki Nextcloud integration space. This integration allows you to register Nextcloud instances to XWiki. Go to the XWiki Administration section of your Nextcloud instance and follow the instructions. nextcloud.mustbelogged=You must be logged in to use this page nextcloud.questioninstanceaccesspermission=The Nextcloud instance at {URL} is requesting your permission to access XWiki on your behalf. Do you agree? nextcloud.no=No nextcloud.yes=Yes nextcloud.url=URL: nextcloud.goback=Go back nextcloud.continue=Continue nextcloud.register=Register nextcloud.admin=Admin nextcloud.generatetokenfailed=Sorry, we could not generate a token for {URL}. nextcloud.generatetokensucceeded=A token has been generated for {URL}. nextcloud.infotoken=You can create tokens to allow Nextcloud instances to access your XWiki profile and data. It will let Nextcloud show you search results and content relevant to you. You will need to provide these tokens to Nextcloud in the XWiki Nextcloud app. nextcloud.notetoken=Note: to be able to create token for a Nextcloud instance, you need to create a client id for it. Head over to the XWiki administration section of this Nextcloud instance. nextcloud.admininstancetitle=Registered instances nextcloud.noneyet=None yet. nextcloud.registerinstancetitle=Register an instance nextcloud.redirecturi=Redirect URI: nextcloud.infotokencreate=This page is used to create a token from a Nextcloud instance. Please go to the XWiki administration section of the Nextcloud instance you want to register and follow the instructions from there. nextcloud.gobacktonextcloud=Go back to Nextcloud nextcloud.removedcodemodifmsg=Removed code for {URL} nextcloud.registrationfailed=We failed to register the Nextcloud instance. Please report a bug to the developers of the XWiki Nextcloud application. nextcloud.registrationsuccessful=The Nextcloud instance has been successfully registered! nextcloud.hereisclientid=Here is its client ID: nextcloud.infocopyclose=Please copy it and paste it in Nextcloud. You can now close this page. nextcloud.alreadyregistered=This Nextcloud instance is already registered! nextcloud.inforegistering=You are generating a client ID for a Nextcloud instance. nextcloud.inforegisteringmore=If you agree, let's register it. We auto-filled the registration form below. When you are ready, click on “Register”. nextcloud.requestingaccessfromnextcloud=You are requesting access for a Nextcloud instance ({URL}) that is not registered on this wiki. Please ask the administrator to register it. nextcloud.unknownclientid=The client_id is unknown or the redirect_uri does not match nextcloud.userrejected=The user rejected the connection
